content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mr. Smith. I'm pleased to have you here. Please, make yourself comfortable. We can discuss the rental price of the apartment. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to rent this apartment. Based on the size and location, I believe a fair price would be around 1200 Euro per month. Is this within your consideration?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Your offer of 1200 Euro per month is an interesting starting point, Mr. Smith. While it is below my initial expectations, I am willing to consider it. Can you provide me with more details about the terms of the lease and any additional services that might be included?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mr. Heine. The lease term would be for a minimum of one year, with the possibility of renewal. Additional services include access to the building's gym and communal garden. There are also no hidden fees; all utilities are included in the price, with the exception of internet, which I would be responsible for. I believe these terms are quite competitive and would provide you with a reliable tenant. What is your counter-offer regarding the rental price?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your comprehensive offer, Mr. Smith. The additional services and included utilities are indeed attractive. However, considering the current market and the desirability of the location, I would need a slightly higher price to meet my expectations. How does 1350 Euro per month sound to you? This would reflect the premium value of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
